amendment.description: An amendment numbered 10 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to make the Customs and Border Protection's Office of Air and Marine Operations the lead DHS agency to conduct airspace security around the Nation's Capitol and for special events of national significance. Also calls for a report within 90 days from DHS that identifies the facility, asset, and personnel requirements to fulfill the airspace security mission.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Souder amendment was withdrawn.
